DOC.detailed_description: Purpose clinical trial : To evaluate effect regional citrate anti-coagulation different pathway coagulation system critically ill patient acute kidney injury . Patient population : critically ill patient acute kidney injury require citrate-based continuous renal replacement therapy ( CRRT ) Primary objective : Changes baseline number measure coagulability ( platelet count ; Prothrombin Time ; Activated Partial Thromboplastin Time ratio ; fibrinogen ; d-dimers ; Thrombin generation assay ; Clot lysis ; platelet function analysis 100 ) blood within patient 's systemic circulation CRRT circuit course 72 hour regional anticoagulation citrate . Number Subjects/Patients : 12 patient complete data . Trial Design : Prospective non-interventional study . Endpoints : Change baseline number measure coagulability . Main Inclusion Criteria : Adult intensive care patient undergo CRRT citrate regional anti-coagulation AKI .
